name: Hoppik
description:
A remastered version of our old Unity game. Controls Use mouse to jump left or right. You can only jump off branches - watch for the branch to bend and time your jumps properly!
The birds give you a boost if bounced off, but make sure to time it properly and end above a branch so you don't fall. ;)

Designed by Stefan Sincak and me, art by Sharley.
